page.title: 18A Day In My Life
page.content: by Paul McCammon I am 12 years old,and I go to the Windmill C.E. Middle School. Stourport on Severn. I get up at 07:30 every weekday,I get dressed into my school uniform,and then have my breakfast,usually cereals and coffee.I leave for school at about 08:20.School starts at 09:00,with an assemblely,and after this we read for 15 minutes. I am in the 4th year of our school,so we are grouped for some subjects.My worst subject is French. We leave school at 15:45.When I get home,I play on my computer.After my tea I go out to play until 20:30.When I get in I watch the television or read until I go to bed at 22:00.
